https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nBaVsNvUxIuvhPw3xTaAJIw8me4.jpg After discovering he has powers, 11-year-old Jonathan Kent and assassin-turned-Boy-Wonder Damian Wayne must join forces to rescue their fathers (Superman & Batman) and save the planet from the malevolent alien force known as Starro. Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons
